Cases

In the this section you will be presented some test cases and we would like you to answer the questions in relation to each case.

Here, a tumor is present in the left frontal lobe. The tracts shown in a 3D interactive view at the right are obtained by using regular fiber tracking with a single scan. Based on the resulting fiber tracts, please answer the questions based on your judgments.

Q Based on the resulting fiber tracts, do you think the margins are enough to choose the awake procedure for the tumor resection surgery?
Q How confident are you about your decision?
Q Do the presented fiber tracts affect the clinical decisions, for example, the resection path?
Q How confident are you about your decision?

https://faizansiddiqui91.github.io/Data/tumor.vtk
https://faizansiddiqui91.github.io/Data/T1_mha_tumor.mha
